name: disable_roaming
doc:
def disable_roaming(customer_id: str, line_id: str) -> str:
    """
Disables international roaming on a line.

Args:
    customer_id: ID of the customer who owns the line.
    line_id: ID of the line to disable roaming for.

Returns:
    Message indicating the roaming has been enabled.

Raises:
    ValueError: If customer or line not found.
"""

customer_id.description: ID of the customer who owns the line.
customer_id.title: Customer Id

line_id.description: ID of the line to disable roaming for.
line_id.title: Line Id

returns.description: Message indicating the roaming has been enabled.
returns.title: Returns
